title: Which dictatorship is better, far right or far left? - Quora

response.answer_text: From the perspective of a citizen waiting for the dictatorship to come to an end, a far-right dictatorship would be better as they generally last a lot shorter length of time than far-left dictatorships. A far-right dictatorship will always collapse shortly after the death of the original cult leader, whereas a far-left dictatorship can survive the cult leader’s death and keep passing the torch, only ending once it collapses from other conditions. From the perspective of the dictator, it depends on if you’re concerned about your dictatorship extending after your death, while you’re alive there would be very little difference from your perspective.

They both suck, and generally result in mass death. Left-wing totalitarians will shoot your boss and might let you die in a famine. Right-wing totalitarians will party with your boss and throw you in a gas chamber if they don’t like you. America has been supporting right-wing dictators for about 70 years, because right-wing dictators are friendly to America’s brand of mercantile dystopian capitalism.
